title: What happened to Taliyah
body: Like 100-0 real quick, but why? One week shes top pick in pro play, next shes cosplaying a literal fucking potato. I understand Rylai's nerf had something to do with it, but that can't be it. And what is her current state in your opinion? Feel like she's good in the right hands, but in general sucks. Also, what made her so strong?

replies.body:
Her current state?
Playable, but only for Taliyah fans. Don't touch her, or riot will notice her and nerf her again.

Isn't she weak? I mean she currently has around 44% win rate with 1% play rate, doesn't that mean that she's weak? The few people who play her are usually OTP/people who occasionally play her.
That means that even the players who know the champion enough can't reach at least 48% win rate with her, I don't think she's just "playable".

> [{quoted}](name=Swarovsko,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MvjaIB6p,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-12-31T16:46:20.453+0000)
>
> Isn't she weak? I mean she currently has around 44% win rate with 1% play rate, doesn't that mean that she's weak? The few people who play her are usually OTP/people who occasionally play her.
> That means that even the players who know the champion enough can't reach at least 48% win rate with her, I don't think she's just "playable".

Well I have a 63% winrate in 112 games this season. She is playable if you main her, that's the "problem" I guess?
You won't reach a 50% winrate if you just occasionally play her.

they fucked up her W, buffed her when she was perfectly balanced because everyone was crying that she was "weak" just because she wasn't broken on release, then subsequently nerfed her down because of it.

And I predicted every step of it too.

Sucks.

She is actually rather good. People will just never admit it until they stop expecting champs to be faceroll like Camille.

Started out a bit weak. Got buffed in 6.10 hotfix and 6.11 and was fine. Then 6.14 happened which made her too strong because her e-w (now w-e) was easier to land. Then they overnerfed the q bonus damage to minions(6.18), nerfed her ult cd (6.15 I think), and gutted her e-w damage (6.14 and 6.18). With the q buffs from the last few patches she's playable but pretty weak and also a lot less fun/satisfying to play imo.

taliyah's actually good, peole just can't play her :I
also hi taz :3

> [{quoted}](name=AgeOfTheMage,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MvjaIB6p,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-30T18:27:53.582+0000)
>
> taliyah's actually good, peole just can't play her :I
> also hi taz :3

level 6 Taliyah lover here and no she's not, Riot taking away her damage to minions, which is what made her Taliyah, was a huge mistake, they took away an essential part of her kit and now have no idea how to balance her, 50% was a bit overwhelming but removing it entirely was such a huge mistake. The only thing that REALLY sucks about her aside from her Q, is the fact that they changed her W to vector casting which just messes everything up and hasn't helped me out one bit since they changed it
